title: Spy Girl
description:
What do you do with a theater arts degree and no real idea what you want to do next? Emily Brandwin moved home and tried everything. And when she answered an unlikely  job ad, a little bit of movie magic happened. Emily became a spy for the CIA. 

Follow Emily on Twitter: @CIAspygirl 

Read more of Emily’s story on her website: CIASpyGirl.com

Listen ad free with Wondery+. Join Wondery+ for exclusives, binges, early access, and ad free listening. Available in the Wondery App. 

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--
